body_html:
I'm receiving the same error (FailedPreconditionError (see above for traceback): Attempting to use uninitialized value beta1_power) when I try something as simple as

optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimizer()

followed by

sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())

while trying to train my sequence to sequence model. By contrast, optimizer = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=initial_learning_rate) works fine. Am I doing something wrong, or is this currently a bug with TensorFlow?
body_text:
I'm receiving the same error (FailedPreconditionError (see above for traceback): Attempting to use uninitialized value beta1_power) when I try something as simple as
optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimizer()
followed by
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
while trying to train my sequence to sequence model. By contrast, optimizer = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=initial_learning_rate) works fine. Am I doing something wrong, or is this currently a bug with TensorFlow?
body:
I'm receiving the same error (`FailedPreconditionError (see above for traceback): Attempting to use uninitialized value beta1_power`) when I try something as simple as 

`optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimizer()`

followed by

`sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())`

while trying to train my sequence to sequence model. By contrast, `optimizer = tf.train.GradientDescentOptimizer(learning_rate=initial_learning_rate)` works fine. Am I doing something wrong, or is this currently a bug with TensorFlow?
